headline: A Look at ON Semiconductor’s Valuation After Teledyne Partnership for Advanced Infrared Imaging Systems
summary: ON Semiconductor (ON) made headlines after announcing that Teledyne Technologies will use its Treo platform to develop next-generation integrated circuits for advanced infrared imaging systems. This collaboration highlights ON Semiconductor’s growing presence in critical sectors such as aerospace and defense. See our latest analysis for ON Semiconductor. Shares of ON Semiconductor have seen notable volatility in recent months, with the stock sliding more than 16% year-to-date and delivering a...

headline: onsemi’s Treo Platform Selected by Teledyne    for Advanced Infrared Imaging Design
summary: Treo’s ROIC process technology leverages high-density, low-power architecture for mission-critical aerospace, defense, security, and scientific applicationsSCOTTSDALE, Ariz., Oct. 28, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- onsemi today announced that Teledyne Technologies has selected its Treo platform to develop next-generation readout integrated circuit (ROIC) application-specific integrated circuits (ASICs) for infrared imaging systems. headline: MTU Maintenance and Teledyne Controls Partner to Deliver Enhanced Engine Health Monitoring
summary: EL SEGUNDO, Calif., October 28, 2025--MTU Maintenance, a global market leader in customized solutions for aero engines, and Teledyne Controls, a leader in aircraft data management, have announced a new partnership to deliver enhanced engine health monitoring and predictive maintenance services to their customers.
